mapper.select: select p.no as no, p.title as title, k.name as kind, u.nickname as nickname, p.hit as hit, p.recommend as recommend, p.level_no as level, start_time as startTime, end_time as endTime, case when start_time <= now() and end_time > now() then 1 when start_time > now() then 2 when end_time <= now() then 3 else 4 end priority from problem p, user u, kind k where p.user_no = u.no and p.kind_no = k.no and p.level_no = 6 and state = 'y' and p.start_time is not null and p.end_time is not null order by priority, p.reg_date desc
